decision_conditions: The development hereby permitted shall not be carried out except in complete accordance with the details shown on Drawing Nos. 106323 - 01 3500 A, 106323 - 01 3200 A,  106323 - 01 3300 A,  106323 - 01 3100 A,  106323 - 01 3101 A and 106323 - 01 3201 A received 03.04.23 and shall thereafter be retained/maintained for as long as the development remains in existence.
To ensure the development complies with the provisions Hillingdon Local Plan Parts 1 (November 2012) and 2 (January 2020) and the London Plan (2021).

The ground floor window serving the shower room and facing No. 14 Gerrard Gardens shall be glazed with permanently obscured glass to at least scale 4 on the Pilkington scale and be non-opening below a height of 1.8 metres taken from internal finished floor level for so long as the development remains in existence.
To prevent overlooking to adjoining properties in accordance with policy DMHB 11 of the Hillingdon Local Plan Part 2 (2020).

Notwithstanding the non-material amendments hereby approved, other than condition 2, which is superseded by the above condition, all other conditions relating to Planning Permission Ref: 62092/APP/2021/3970 , dated 20-12-2021 must be discharged/adhered to
description: Non-material amendment to planning permission ref. (62092/APP/2021/3970) dated 25/10/2021 for the alteration to roof of single storey rear extension, alterations to fenestration and associated internal alterations to amend position of the proposed lantern in the flat roof.
